item.title: 分布式计算整理-1
item.description: 该笔记整理是基于邱怡轩老师在2024春季面向本科生开设的分布式计算课程的课堂讲解和讲义，整理的目的是巩固并加深本人对相关内容的理解，同时让读者在相对更短的时间内对该课程的关键内容有较为全面的概览。

item.title: Simple Insights About Transformer Model
item.description: This is a brief introduction to transformer that simplifies the model’s structure to help build a quick understanding of what it is trying to realize. The original blogs and video where I learned about it have been posted below.

item.title: Cs231n Labnotes1
item.description: I’m recently working on cs231n. This is the github link and I’ll update the labnotes simultaneously here.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Xiaocao You, a junior majoring in Statistics at Shanghai University of Finance and Economics. My studies have sparked a interest in the realms of biomedical research and statistics. Also, I harbor great curiosity towards modeling financial phenomena. I acknowledge that my current knowledge is not extensive, so I maintain an open-minded attitude towards exploring directions in other fields. I thoroughly enjoy articulating my insights, whether through written explanations or face-to-face communication.

item.title: Basics of Mixture Cure Model
item.description: When it comes to Survival Analysis, numerous bloggers have provided clear introductions. In contrast, content related to cure models is relatively scarce.
